Package game.used.objects.hero

Class BlueFairy

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
city.cs.engine.Walker
game.used.objects.hero.Hero
game.used.objects.hero.BlueFairy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BlueFairy
extends Hero
implements java.io.Serializable
One of the Heroines to pick from in the game. Instance of Hero. Has similar methods to FatFairy. Her name is Booma.
See Also:
Hero, FatFairy, FatControl, Serialized Form
